clinical_study.official_title: TIFU: A Non-Interventional, Descriptive Cohort Study to Describe the Use of Ticagrelor in Patients With Acute Coronary Syndrome (TIFU: Ticagrelor in Fuwai Hospital)

lead_sponsor.agency: Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences, Fuwai Hospital

clinical_study.source: Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences, Fuwai Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single-arm non-interventional cohort study. This study is to describe the contemporary use of ticagrelor in a "real-world" setting, to reflect its acceptance and patients' compliance, and to observe its one-year safety in patients with acute coronary syndrome in Fuwai Hospital.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with switching between clopidogrel and ticagrelor
Number of participants with switching between clopidogrel and ticagrelor without a reloading dose
Number of Participants with discontinuation of P2Y12 receptor antagonist
Number of Participants with ticagrelor combined with other anticoagulants

secondary_outcome.measure: Cardiovascular Mortality, Myocardial Infarction(MI), Ischemic Stoke
secondary_outcome.description: composite incidence Myocardial infarction is defined and subclassified in accordance with ACC/AHA/ESC third universal definition of myocardial infarction Ischemic stroke: an acute episode of focal cerebral, spinal, or retinal dysfunction caused by infarction, defined by at least one of the following: Pathological, imaging, or other objective evidence of acute, focal cerebral, spinal, or retinal ischemic injury in a defined vascular distribution Symptoms of acute cerebral, spinal, or retinal ischemic injury persisting ≧24 h, with other etiologies excluded Hemorrhage may be a consequence of ischemic stroke. In this situation, the stroke is an ischemic stroke with hemorrhagic transformation and not a hemorrhagic stroke.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of bleeding event will be recorded (defined in accordance with PLATO definition)

arm_group.arm_group_label: the use of ticagrelor in hospital

study_pop.textblock: This study will include more than 1200 ACS patients using ticagrelor in Fuwai hospital from May 2016 to May 2017.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. ≧18 years
2. Established diagnosis of acute coronary syndrome
3. The use of ticagrelor in hospital
4. agree to join this clinical trial and sign informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Life-expectancy <1 year
2. Dialysis required
